page.title: 11COTSWOLD SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: We have a sports centre in Cirencester. People travel up to 20 miles to get there. We talked to Mrs Bishop Bailey, the manageress who said that there were squash courts, a main hall, a weight training room, activity room and two swimming pools. About 400,000 people use the sports centre every year. When people go swimming there is always a life guard on duty. There are between 10 and 20 accidents every year. 29 people work there. They feel the centre should have a bigger creche. The creche cares for young children so mothers can have fun. The public said the pool should be bigger. Most people said they use the sports centre once a week. Activities:Squash,Badmington,Swimming, Judo,Karate,Trampolining,Football,Gym, Cricket,Table Tennis,Keep Fit,Sauna, Solarium,Rollerskating
